redis.clients.blocked.name: redis.clients.blocked
redis.clients.blocked.definition: The number of connections waiting on a blocking call

redis.info.latency_ms.name: redis.info.latency_ms
redis.info.latency_ms.definition: The latency of the redis INFO command

redis.mem.used.name: rredis.mem.used
redis.mem.used.definition: Amount of memory allocated by Redis

redis.net.clients.name: redis.net.clients
redis.net.clients.definition: The number of connected clients (excluding slaves)

redis.rdb.changes_since_last.name: redis.rdb.changes_since_last
redis.rdb.changes_since_last.definition: The number of changes since the last background save

redis.slowlog.micros.avg.name: redis.slowlog.micros.avg
redis.slowlog.micros.avg.definition: The average duration of queries reported in the slow log

redis.stats.keyspace_hits.name: redis.stats.keyspace_hits
redis.stats.keyspace_hits.definition: The total number of successful lookups in the db

redis.aof.last_rewrite_time.name: redis.aof.last_rewrite_time
redis.aof.last_rewrite_time.definition: Duration of the last AOF rewrite

redis.aof.rewrite.name: redis.aof.rewrite
redis.aof.rewrite.definition: Flag indicating a AOF rewrite operation is on-going

redis.clients.biggest_input_buf.name: redis.clients.biggest_input_buf
redis.clients.biggest_input_buf.definition: The biggest input buffer among current client connections

redis.clients.longest_output_list.name: redis.clients.longest_output_list
redis.clients.longest_output_list.definition: The longest output list among current client connections

redis.cpu.sys.name: redis.cpu.sys
redis.cpu.sys.definition: System CPU consumed by the Redis server

redis.cpu.sys_children.name: redis.cpu.sys_children
redis.cpu.sys_children.definition: System CPU consumed by the background processes

redis.cpu.user.name: redis.cpu.user
redis.cpu.user.definition: User CPU consumed by the Redis server
